title: Marking Red
description: My, what sweet curves you have...Kade is used to keeping himself in check.As a wolf shifter living so close to humans, he's needed too.Keeping his packs secret has never been a problem.Until she shows up.Ruby James.Her red hair, those curves, her infectious laugh. All of it is like a sirens call to him. One that he's powerless to resist.She's his fated mate, the little red riding hood to his big, bad wolf, but Kade knows that this isn't a fairytale.She's in town to clear out her Grams place but, eventually, she'll leave him, just like everyone else.Unless he can change her mind and mark her before she has a chance to get away.Come meet the shifters of the North Star pack as they find their fated mates. These four Alpha’s are hot and wealthy just like the fairy tale characters that they’re based on! These guys just have a little more... bite.
author: Skye Alder
